tool_description: Cleans and normalizes feedback text data by removing noise, standardizing format, and preparing text for classification algorithms.

feedback_texts.description: Array of raw feedback text to preprocess

lowercase.description: Whether to convert text to lowercase

error_messages: Empty feedback array: Provide at least one feedback text to process.
Invalid text format: Ensure all array items are valid strings.
Invalid min_word_length: Value must be between 1 and 10.
Processing failed: Unable to process one or more feedback texts due to encoding issues.
usage: Provide an array of feedback_texts and configure preprocessing options. The tool returns cleaned text ready for classification.

word_counts.description: Word count for each processed text
